story.text: We write scripts in html to be run alone in their own tab or in a wiki Frame where they can add pages to the lineup. We save these in a repo and upload the versions we want to a wiki asset folder.
We include a jpeg with each script which completes our visual menu. See [[Spark Decodes]]
